http://www.jcbsong.co.uk/jcbvideo.asp . ~Rue

Sounds painful!

It was beautiful. I've had to listen to it a bunch of times to
understand all the words. Uh, well, almost all...

Off to jcb.com to explain that reference to ds!!

--aj

Rue Kream wrote:

>The link would probably help - http://www.jcbsong.co.uk/jcbvideo.asp . ~Rue
>

ARGH! Okay, I'm sitting here nearly balling my eyes out about "holding
up the bypass"! So, maybe I'm a bit emotional, pmsing and trying to get
this move together, but still, you can't just sneak that in on me, Rue!

I love it! How in the world did you come across it?

--
~~Danielle
